MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the DG12 postcode area of Annan has been extended. This is due to difficulties getting to site and we now expect power to be back on by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:31am on Tuesday, 13 April 2021
